Text:

Anybody know where there are subtitles ?
Both English and French.
Please post link.
cant find any subtiltes for this film :(

Thank you!

And you can find English subtitles here: http://subtitlesbank.com/dans-la-maison-english-srt-2521291/

Terrible picture quality. Extremely blocky, which is to be expected when the bitrate is this low. 
In some places it's fine - but in many, it's just bad.

Hi,
cinesimon is harsh but it's true, there is something wrong with the video compression. I had never seen x264 look like some old XVid in some parts of the film and wish I had downloaded a good DVD rip because in this instance, high def doesn't bring anything.
Have nice day.

@ miwies

Thanks for the link to the subtitles. They are not the best quality, but will have to do until someone posts retail subtitles. If such a thing exists for this film.
